articles.description: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 357.59 points at 69,653.73 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty 50 settled 82.60 points higher at 20,937.70.

articles.author: Hormaz Fatakia
articles.title: Dividend Stock: Hindustan Zinc announces lowest payout in five years - Check Vedanta's share, record date - CNBCTV18
articles.description: As per the September quarter shareholding pattern, Vedanta holds a 64.92% stake in Hindustan Zinc, most of which is pledged. Based on the stake, Vedanta will receive a total payout of ₹1,645 crore.

articles.author: Subramani Ra Mancombu
articles.title: Indian cotton prices drop to 2-year low on slack demand - BusinessLine
articles.description: Chennai cotton prices hit two-yr low due to slack demand in US & UK. Low crop & low offers from spinning mills causing prices to drop to ₹7,000/quintal. Cottonseed prices below ₹3,000/quintal & ginned cotton at ₹56,000-55,000/candy. CCI spent ₹900 cr on purch…
articles.content:
Cotton prices in India have declined to a two-year low on slack demand due to economic woes in western nations, particularly the US and UK, traders have said.
